game.name: Stellar Drift
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, LAN PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Carve out a place for yourself in an ever changing field of space as you upgrade your bases, and equip your ships to thrive in the mysterious expanse. Dominate "The Drift" solo or with friends as you mine, build, fight, and align with (or sabotage) neighboring factions.
